generalInfoForm.title: General info
generalInfoForm.subtitle: Provide basic information about exhibit. You can enrich it with article and audio.
generalInfoForm.exhibitNumberHelperText: You can organize exhibits in any order you want. However, you are responsible for providing unique exhibit numbers.

languagesForm.title: Available languages
languagesForm.subtitle: Provide info for exhibit in multiple languages. You can add as many languages as you want. At least one language is required.
languagesForm.audioHelperText: Click here to listen or to generate new audio for this language.
languagesForm.noAudioHelperTextSubtitle: No audio generated for this language option.
languagesForm.articleHelperText: Preview description or create new one for this language.
languagesForm.noArticleHelperTextSubtitle: You can enrich your resource with optional description in form of article.

table.noItemsSubtitle: No exhibit found with given search criteria, or you have got no active exhibits. You can create new exhibit by clicking button below.

exhibition.title: Exhibition
exhibition.subtitle: Create or edit exhibitions here. Collections group exhibits

common.uploadHelperText: Click and some pictures here. Pictures will be available in mobile app.

article.title: Prepare article
article.description: You can enrich your resource with descriptive article. Provide text, format and add photos to deliver best experience to your audience.

audio.title: Generate audio
audio.description: In this application, we utilize state-of-the-art artificial intelligence tools to generate audio that closely mimics human speech. To use this feature, you simply need to provide the text you want to be converted into audio. This could be a description of an exhibit, a narration of an article, or any other content that you think would enhance the user's experience. Once you've provided the text, our AI tools will process it and generate an audio file. This audio file will then be available for playback within the application, providing your users with a rich, multimedia experience. This feature is not only limited to English. Our AI tools are capable of synthesizing audio in multiple languages, making your content accessible to a wider audience. Remember, the quality of the synthesized audio greatly depends on the text input. Therefore, it's recommended to use clear and concise language for the best results.

uploadPhoto.title: Upload photos
uploadPhoto.helperTextSubTitle: Drag and drop photos here or click to upload. Photos will be available in mobile app

qrCode.title: QR code
qrCode.description: Unique QR code used to transfer the Visitor to the resource page. Choose one of the available options to print it and place it in a visible location.

languageSelect.title: Select language
languageSelect.description: Select language option for this element.

removeLanguage.title: Remove language
removeLanguage.description: Are you sure you want to remove this language option? This action is irreversible.

deleteExhibit.title: Delete exhibit
deleteExhibit.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this exhibit?

validation.noLanguageOption: You must provide at least one language for collection...
validation.noActiveExhibition: You must have at least one active Exhibition to manage Exhibits.
validation.languageOptionExists: Language option already exists for this element.
